short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monitor and manage Jira issues across multiple instances directly from Chrome with real-time updates.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Jira Tracker Plus is a powerful Chrome extension designed to streamline your workflow by allowing you to monitor and manage your Jira issues without ever leaving your browser. Whether you are a project manager, a software developer, or part of a dynamic team handling multiple tasks across various Jira instances, this tool is built to enhance productivity and provide real-time updates.


KEY FEATURES:

𝗠𝘂𝗹𝘁𝗶-𝗜𝗻𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲 𝗦𝘂𝗽𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁: Connects seamlessly with multiple Jira instances. Whether you're toggling between different organizational projects or tracking separate client workstreams, all your issues are accessible from one place.

𝗥𝗲𝗮𝗹-𝗧𝗶𝗺𝗲 𝗡𝗼𝘁𝗶𝗳𝗶𝗰𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀: Stay informed with immediate updates. Get notifications for new or updated issues based on your last access, ensuring you never miss critical changes or new assignments.

𝗖𝘂𝘀𝘁𝗼𝗺𝗶𝘇𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲 𝗙𝗲𝘁𝗰𝗵 𝗜𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗿𝘃𝗮𝗹𝘀: Set specific polling intervals for each Jira instance. Customize how frequently you receive updates, optimizing for your workflow and reducing unnecessary notifications.

𝗨𝘀𝗲𝗿-𝗙𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗱𝗹𝘆 𝗜𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗳𝗮𝗰𝗲: Features a clean, intuitive interface that displays issues in a compact, easy-to-read table format. Each issue's key details, such as type, priority, and status, are visible at a glance.

𝗧𝗶𝗺𝗲 𝗭𝗼𝗻𝗲 𝗥𝗲𝘀𝗽𝗲𝗰𝘁: Automatically adjusts issue creation and update times to match your local time zone, eliminating confusion and simplifying scheduling.

𝗘𝗳𝗳𝗶𝗰𝗶𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗜𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲 𝗠𝗮𝗻𝗮𝗴𝗲𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁: Direct links to issue pages on Jira, streamlined updates on priority and status, and the ability to watch tasks of other users or your assignments, enhancing collaboration and tracking.


WHY INSTALL JIRA TRACKER PLUS?

Enhance your efficiency by integrating your Jira workflow directly into Chrome. With Jira Tracker Plus, you reduce the need to switch between tabs or apps, maintain focus on your current tasks, and manage your projects with agility. Ideal for professionals who rely on Jira for project management and issue tracking, this extension is a robust tool designed to fit seamlessly into your daily routine, ensuring that you are always connected and informed about your projects.

Whether you're looking to boost productivity, streamline project tracking, or simply manage your daily tasks more effectively, Jira Tracker Plus is the perfect solution. Install today and transform the way you interact with Jira!
